最基础的日期选择、日期时间选择。.en-us: The most basic date picker and date-time picker.

由参数`showTime.defaultValue`设定的默认值，将会在用户初次.en-us: The default value set via `showTime.defaultValue` will be auto-selected in the time panel after the user selects a date for the first time.

设置参数`placement`控制悬浮层展开方位。.en-us: Use the `placement` parameter to control where the overlay opens.

设置参数`picker`选择不同的日期选择粒度。.en-us: Use the `picker` parameter to choose different date selection granularities.

设置参数`format`以实现不同粒度设置下适合的已选内容回填格式化。.en-us: Use the `format` parameter to format the filled value appropriately for different granularities.

设置参数`disabled=True`开启禁用状态。.en-us: Set `disabled=True` to enable the disabled state.

设置参数`readOnly=True`开启只读状态。.en-us: Set `readOnly=True` to enable the read-only state.

通过参数`prefix`设置选择框内嵌前缀内容。.en-us: Use the `prefix` parameter to set embedded prefix content in the picker.

通过参数`suffixIcon`设置选择框内嵌后缀图标。.en-us: Use the `suffixIcon` parameter to set an embedded suffix icon for the picker.

设置参数`status`强制状态渲染。.en-us: Use the `status` parameter to force status rendering.

设置参数`disabledDatesStrategy`控制需要禁止用户选中的日期.en-us: Use `disabledDatesStrategy` to control which dates are forbidden to select.

通过参数`extraFooter`自定义选择面板底部额外的内容。.en-us: Use `extraFooter` to customize extra content at the bottom of the panel.

通过参数`customCells`对指定规则对应的日期单元格添加额外样式，未填写.en-us: Use `customCells` to add extra styles to date cells that match specific rules; unspecified parts are treated as wildcards.

通过回调函数实现基于当前日期时间的动态禁用策略，以“只允许选择未来7天内日期”为.en-us: Implement dynamic disabling based on the current date and time via callbacks—for example, “only allow selecting dates within the next 7 days.”

监听面板停留位置.en-us: Listen to the panel anchor position

通过回调函数监听`pickerValue`的变化，获取当前面板停留位置。.en-us: Listen to changes in `pickerValue` via a callback to get the panel’s current anchor position.
